item.title: 瑞银银行家的挫败感暴露了气候融资领域的裂缝
item.description:
全球最大的银行正在悄悄地挽留碳密集型客户，因为在它们看来，监管机构和民间社会提出的要求并不现实，而且对它们的收费也构成了威胁。【原文：

The world’s biggest banks are quietly hanging on to carbon-intensive clients because of what they see as unrealistic demands from regulators and civil society — and the threat to their fees.

】

item.title: FTX 的原罪是对所有加密货币的警告
item.description:
山姆-班克曼-弗里德的刑事审判证据表明，FTX 从一开始就存在欺诈行为。【原文：

Evidence from the criminal trial of Sam Bankman-Fried suggests fraud was built into FTX from the very beginning.

】

item.title: 谈判破裂后，华盛顿特区的 NBA 和 NHL 球队不会迁至弗吉尼亚州
item.description: 由于弗吉尼亚州州长和东道主亚历山大市未能就项目条款达成一致，拟议中的耗资 20 亿美元的体育娱乐区计划已被搁置，华盛顿特区的两支职业运动队（篮球队华盛顿奇才队和曲棍球队华盛顿首都队）将迁至弗吉尼亚州。【原文：Plans for a proposed $2 billion sports and entertainment district that would have seen two professional DC sports teams — basketball’s Washington Wizards and hockey’s Washington Capitals — move to Virginia have been shelved after the state governor and the host city of Alexandria failed to agree on terms for the project.】

item.title: 马克龙政府计划进行具有政治风险的福利削减
item.description: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）承诺进一步削减失业福利，在欧洲大选前冒着引起反弹的风险，因为他正努力控制失控的预算赤字，并继续推进埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的经济改革议程。【原文：French Prime Minister Gabriel Attal pledged more cuts to unemployment welfare, risking a backlash ahead of European elections as he seeks to tame a runaway budget deficit and press on with President Emmanuel Macron’s economic-reform agenda.】

item.title: 富时暂不将韩国和印度纳入主要债券指数
item.description: 富时罗素（FTSE Russell）表示，韩国将继续留在其全球债券指数的观察名单上；印度将继续留在其新兴市场债券指数的观察名单上；这再次将这些国家加入关键指数的时间至少再推迟六个月。【原文：FTSE Russell said South Korea will continue to stay on the watch list for inclusion to its global bond index — and India for the emerging-market equivalent — once more delaying the countries’ addition to the key indexes by at least another six months.】

item.title: 跨山项目启动在即，加拿大石油流向洛杉矶
item.description: 加拿大运往洛杉矶的原油量激增，这可能预示着即将启动的扩建输油管道将如何重新分配太平洋沿岸的油流。【原文：Canadian crude shipments to Los Angeles are surging, a possible preview of how an expanded pipeline that’s nearing startup may redraw flows along the Pacific Coast.】

item.title: 地产公司 Adler 希望以高达 47% 的折扣出售资产
item.description: 阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）要求其债券持有人允许其将一个未完工的公寓开发项目以比不到两年前的估值折价 47% 的价格出售，因为这家陷入困境的房东正在努力偿还其巨额债务。【原文：Adler Group SA asked its bondholders for permission to sell an unfinished apartment development at a 47% discount from where it was valued less than two years ago, as the embattled landlord races to repay its vast debt load.】

item.title: 施莱格尔称瑞士国家银行没有设定法郎汇率目标
item.description: 瑞士国家银行副行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士国家银行没有为法郎汇率设定目标，在此之前不到一周，瑞士国家银行的政策制定者们通过降低利率来阻止法郎的涨势，从而误导了市场。【原文：The Swiss National Bank has no target for the franc exchange rate, Vice President Martin Schlegel said less than a week after policymakers wrong-footed markets by cutting interest rates to stem the currency’s gains.】

item.title: 卖空者的获胜赌注意味着杰富瑞将获得永久付款
item.description: 一个做空者押注一家陷入困境的零售连锁店，声称它现在正在付出代价：每月向 Jefferies LLC 无休止地付款，而 Jefferies LLC 十多年前曾借给它股票用于交易。【原文：A short seller that bet against a struggling retail chain claims it’s now paying the price: an endless stream of monthly payments to Jefferies LLC, which lent it the shares for the trade more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 摩根大通称股市拥挤埋下 "突然袭击 "风险
item.description: 这是股市的话题：美国股市长达五个月的涨势即将结束的标志是什么？但如果你问摩根大通公司的 Dubravko Lakos-Bujas，投资者可能不会看到它的到来。【原文：It’s the talk of the stock market: What will be the sign that the five-month rally in US equities is coming to an end. But if you ask JPMorgan Chase Co.’s Dubravko Lakos-Bujas, investors may not see it coming when it hits.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉公司将支付 1.26 亿美元并承认在巴西行贿
item.description: Trafigura 集团将支付 1.26 亿美元，并承认美国对其在巴西的贿赂指控，这是大宗商品贸易巨头涉及腐败的最新一起案件。【原文：Trafigura Group will pay $126 million and plead guilty to US charges related to bribery in Brazil, in the latest case involving corruption by a commodity trading giant.】

item.title: 德国在国防工业调整中加快武器采购速度
item.description: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后，德国计划加快武器采购的审批速度，并为大型武器合同提供更多的规划确定性，以推动国防工业的调整。【原文：Germany plans to speed up the approval of weapons purchases and provide more planning certainty for big arms contracts in a push to adapt its defense industry after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 德意志银行遭入侵后，WeWork 基金失去最后一个伦敦办公室
item.description: 一家与陷入困境的灵活办公巨头 WeWork 公司（WeWork Inc.【原文：A fund tied to beleaguered flexible office giant WeWork Inc. has lost control of its last remaining London property after breaching its banking covenants.】

item.title: 派拉蒙债务被降至 "垃圾 "级，原因是电视业务前景恶化
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司的债务评级被标准普尔全球评级公司（Standard & Poor's Global Ratings）下调为垃圾级，理由是该公司的广播和有线电视业务持续下滑，对现金流造成压力。【原文：Paramount Global’s debt rating was cut to junk by Standard & Poor’s Global Ratings, which cited pressure on cash flow because of the continued decline in the company’s broadcast and cable TV business.】

item.title: 高乐氏阿根廷资产买家押注消费反弹
item.description: 克乐氏公司在阿根廷资产的买家预计，由于哈维尔-米莱伊总统的紧缩措施，阿根廷的消费将在未来几个月内从年初的急剧下降中恢复过来。【原文：The buyer of Clorox Co. assets in Argentina expects consumption in the South American country to recover in coming months from a steep decline early in the year due to President Javier Milei’s austerity measures.】

item.title: 花旗集团通过罕见的可交换债券向投资者出售 LVMH 风险敞口
item.description: 花旗集团全球市场控股公司（Citigroup Global Markets Holdings Inc.【原文：Citigroup Global Markets Holdings Inc. offered convertible bond investors a chance to get exposure to fashion and fine wine conglomerate LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE with an unusual exchangeable note.】

item.title: 欧盟就延长乌克兰免关税贸易达成妥协
item.description: 欧盟成员国周三达成了一项艰难的妥协，将乌克兰的免关税贸易再延长一年，因为整个欧盟的农民一直在抗议从这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家进口粮食。【原文：European Union member states struck a hard-fought compromise Wednesday to extend tariff-free trade for Ukraine for another year as farmers across the bloc have been protesting food imports from the war-torn nation.】

item.title: Aethon 称，投资者认为海恩斯维尔页岩是 IPO 的最佳时机
item.description: 投资者对路易斯安那州天然气丰富的海恩斯维尔页岩地区更多上市钻探公司的兴趣日益浓厚，据紧密控股的 Aethon Energy Management 公司称。【原文：There is growing investor interest in more publicly traded drillers in the natural gas-rich Haynesville Shale of Louisiana, according to closely held Aethon Energy Management.】

item.title: 特鲁多承诺提高租房者权利以争取年轻选民
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）宣布了支持租房者权利并帮助他们过渡到拥有住房的措施，因为他的政府正试图赢回失去的加拿大年轻人的支持。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced measures to support renters’ rights and help them transition to homeownership as his government attempts to win back lost support among younger Canadians.】

item.title: 据说布朗大学、BTG Pactual 接近 Fortress 投资
item.description: 作为阿布扎比主权财富基金收购另类资产管理公司 Fortress Investment Group 多数股权的一部分，布朗大学和巴西 BTG Pactual 公司正在就与穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Brown University and Brazil’s BTG Pactual are in advanced talks to invest in Fortress Investment Group alongside Mubadala Investment Co. as part of the Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund’s acquisition of a majority stake in the alternative asset manager.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 ADQ 有意竞购波兰家禽公司 Cedrob
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，阿布扎比财富基金 ADQ 是可能竞购波兰最大家禽和肉类生产商 Cedrob 集团的潜在收购方之一。【原文：Abu Dhabi wealth fund ADQ is among potential suitors looking at a possible bid for Cedrob Group, Poland’s biggest poultry and meat producer, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储称页岩气企业首席执行官对美国政治 "不确定性 "感到遗憾
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行称，美国的油价高得足以让钻探新油井有利可图，但一些页岩油公司的老板表示，由于政治和监管方面的 "不确定性"，他们还在犹豫不决，因为这些问题要等到11月的大选才能解决。【原文：US oil prices are more than high enough to make drilling new wells profitable but some shale bosses say they’re hesitant because of political and regulatory “uncertainty” that won’t be settled until the November election, according to the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 法国建筑商和西班牙机场管理公司争夺耗资 30 亿英镑的爱丁堡机场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国建筑商 Vinci SA 和西班牙国有控股机场管理公司 Aena SME SA 正在竞争从苏格兰爱丁堡机场所有者 Global Infrastructure Partners 手中收购该机场。【原文：French builder Vinci SA and Spain’s state-controlled airport manager Aena SME SA are competing to acquire Edinburgh Airport in Scotland from its owner, Global Infrastructure Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 荷兰浮动替代方案加快 TenneT 出售德国电网的速度
item.description: 在向柏林政府出售荷兰公用事业公司 TenneT Holding BV 旗下德国电网的谈判陷入僵局之际，荷兰正在寻求加快出售该电网的途径。【原文：The Netherlands is seeking ways to hasten the sale of Dutch utility TenneT Holding BV’s German power grid as talks to sell the unit to the government in Berlin drag on.】

item.title: 手臂押注 2026 年到期的期权，获利 3 亿美元
item.description: 在过去两天里，一名或一组交易员通过平仓看涨 Arm Holdings PLC 的期权头寸，净赚了约 3 亿美元。【原文：A trader or group of traders netted some $300 million over the past two days by closing out bullish options positions in Arm Holdings PLC.】

item.title: 贝莱德代币化基金上市一周吸金 1.6 亿美元
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s money-market fund that records share ownership on the Ethereum blockchain has attracted more than $160 million since its debut a week ago.】

item.title: 纽约市交通拥堵定价获得公交委员会的关键批准
item.description: 纽约市大都会交通管理局批准了全国首个交通拥堵收费计划，该计划最快将于 6 月中旬开始实施，在此之前，纽约市的司机们距离支付进入曼哈顿中央商务区的新费用越来越近了。【原文：Drivers in New York City inched closer to paying a new fee to enter Manhattan’s central business district after the Metropolitan Transportation Authority approved the nation’s first congestion-pricing plan, which could begin as soon as mid-June.】

item.title: DHL 高管表示巴尔的摩港可能在六周内重新开放
item.description: 据一位物流主管称，巴尔的摩港可能会在 5 月份重新开放，因为周二早些时候摧毁弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的船只上的货物将面临长时间的延误。【原文：The Port of Baltimore could reopen in May, according to a logistics executive who has cargo facing long delays aboard the ship that destroyed the Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索创九年新高，套利交易未受影响
item.description: 在高利率、低波动性和充足流动性的共同推动下，墨西哥比索周三升至近九年来的最高点。【原文：Mexico’s peso rose to the highest in almost nine years Wednesday, driven by a combination of high interest rates, low volatility and ample liquidity.】

item.title: 油轮将更多俄罗斯柴油运往供应过剩的巴西
item.description: 满载着数百万桶俄罗斯柴油的油轮正漂浮在巴西海岸线上，更多的柴油即将抵达。【原文：Tankers laden with millions of barrels of Russian diesel are floating off the coast of Brazil — with more on the way.】
